description: Detects suspicious ways to use of a Visual Studio bundled tool named DumpMinitool.exe
name: Suspicious DumpMinitool Usage
query: ((process.executable:*\\DumpMinitool.exe OR OriginalName:"DumpMinitool.exe") AND (((NOT (process.executable:(*\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\* OR *\\Extensions\\*))) OR process.command_line:*.txt*) OR (process.command_line:*\ Full* AND (NOT (process.command_line:*\-\-dumpType*)))))
author: Florian Roth
